desc: BLUEVIEW has fully revolutionized the footwear industry by replacing petroleum plastics with plant based plastics.

layout.text: The World's First Biodegradable* and Durable Sneaker for those committed to the future of the planet. BLUEVIEW is the first to combine biodegradable* materials with an ocean of comfort and serious durability, for a game changing shoe that is sustainable, while still being stylish.
